plentry.pd: Number of audio channels.
Sampling rate of the sent local audio, in Hz.
Average bitrate of the sent local audio, in Kbps.
Packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before anti-packet-loss strategies are applied.
Internal payload type.
Delay of the audio device module during playback or recording, in ms.
Ear monitoring delay (ms), i.e., the delay from microphone input to headphone output.
Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC) delay (ms), i.e., the delay between audio playback locally and the signal captured locally as estimated by the AEC module.
Number of audio channels.
Sampling rate of the sent local audio, in Hz.
Average bitrate of the sent local audio, in Kbps.
Packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before network resilience.
Internal payload type.
Delay (ms) of the audio device module during audio playback or recording.
Ear monitoring delay (ms), i.e., the delay from microphone input to headphone output.
Echo cancellation delay (ms), i.e., the delay estimated by the Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC) module between audio playback and the signal captured locally.
Number of audio channels.
Sampling rate of the sent local audio, in Hz.
Average bitrate of the sent local audio, in Kbps.
Packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before network resilience is applied.
Internal payload type.
Delay (ms) of the audio device module during audio playback or recording.
Ear monitor delay (ms), i.e., the delay from microphone input to headphone output.
Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC) delay (ms), i.e., the delay estimated by the AEC module between audio playback and the signal captured locally.
Number of audio channels.
Sampling rate of the sent local audio, in Hz.
Average bitrate of the sent local audio, in Kbps.
Packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before network resilience.
Internal payload type.
Delay of the audio device module during audio playback or recording (ms).
Ear monitoring delay (ms), i.e., the delay from microphone input to headphone output.
Acoustic Echo Cancellation (AEC) delay (ms), i.e., the delay between the audio played locally and the signal captured again locally as estimated by the AEC module.
